posts.title: I'm a monster.
posts.content: I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun. Across from where? It's a hug, Michael. I'm hugging you. I'm half machine. I'm a monster. It's called 'taking advantage.' It's what gets you ahead in life. Army had half a day. I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. I've opened a door here that I regret. What's Spanish for 'I know you speak English?'' Across from where? We just call it a sausage. It's a hug, Michael. I'm hugging you. That's why you always leave a note! We just call it a sausage. That's why you always leave a note! I care deeply for nature. Get me a vodka rocks. And a piece of toast.

posts.title: We found them
posts.content: Where'd you get the coconuts? How do you know she is a witch? Well, how'd you become king, then? Burn her anyway! Camelot! Ah, now we see the violence inherent in the system! Bloody Peasant! The Lady of the Lake, her arm clad in the purest shimmering samite, held aloft Excalibur from the bosom of the water, signifying by divine providence that I, Arthur, was to carry Excalibur. That is why I am your king. Where'd you get the coconuts? Well, how'd you become king, then? The nose? No, no, no! Yes, yes. A bit. But she's got a wart. The Knights Who Say Ni demand a sacrifice! We shall say 'Ni' again to you, if you do not appease us. How do you know she is a witch? We want a shrubbery!! Where'd you get the coconuts? Well, I got better. We want a shrubbery!! Shut up! Well, how'd you become king, then? Now, look here, my good man.

posts.title: Ye-ha
posts.content: I care. So, what do you think of her, Han? Ye-ha! You mean it controls your actions? You are a part of the Rebel Alliance and a traitor! Take her away! She must have hidden the plans in the escape pod. Send a detachment down to retrieve them, and see to it personally, Commander. There'll be no one to stop us this time! You don't believe in the Force, do you? Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him. Still, she's got a lot of spirit. I don't know, what do you think? He is here. You don't believe in the Force, do you?The Force is strong with this one. I have you now. Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him. Look, I can take you as far as Anchorhead. You can get a transport there to Mos Eisley or wherever you're going.Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan. I've got to go home. It's late, I'm in for it as it is. The Force is strong with this one. I have you now. Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him. Leave that to me. Send a distress signal, and inform the Senate that all on board were killed. Don't underestimate the Force. Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess. I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money. Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess. I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money.
